complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Further break down the configuration of build tools (Vite/Create React App) into smaller, more manageable steps. Consider separating tasks for configuring linters, formatters, and other development tools.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Already broken down into reasonable subtasks. Further division might lead to overly granular tasks.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand on defining TypeScript interfaces for each asset type (stocks, options, forex, crypto, REITs). Create separate tasks for implementing data models for transactions, positions, and portfolios. Detail the implementation of asset categorization logic, including property sector categorization for REITs.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Requires defining multiple data models and implementing complex categorization logic. Needs more granular subtasks.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Consider breaking down the 'Implement Real-Time Price Fetching' task into smaller tasks for each asset type (stocks, crypto, forex).
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Subtasks are already well-defined and cover the main aspects of the integration.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the design and implementation of the responsive table component into smaller tasks focusing on specific features like sorting, filtering, real-time updates, and mobile responsiveness. Create separate tasks for loading states and error handling.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Involves complex UI development with real-time data and responsiveness. Needs more detailed subtasks.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create separate tasks for choosing between SQLite and LocalStorage, implementing the data persistence layer, creating CRUD operations for transactions and positions, adding data migration and backup functionality, implementing offline-first architecture, and adding data synchronization when online.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Requires significant architectural decisions and implementation effort. Needs more granular subtasks.
